entry.title: My spouse is now a government property? (A very OOC fic of superbat)
entry.summary:
Author: banchseaaa

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 328Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 0

Summary: Bruce Wayne received a call today, and no—it's not a call related to meetings or business, it was a call from the government. Why? Because they claimed he harmed government property. Bruce was confused. What government property? Even if he was covering his identity as the freaking Dark Knight, he would've never done such a thing. Hello! This is my first time releasing one of my fics lol, especially with a ship that i love a LOT. This fic is such an OOC, especially with Bruce, lmao. I'm going to follow this fic up with clark kent & batmanclark kent & philanthropist brucie wayne fics where bruce is the "government property" (see note at the end)

entry.title: don't know where you came from (but i need you now)
entry.summary:
Author: Talls

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,731Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 24

Summary: "We’ll make a pact of mutual non-aggression," Clark starts, "get to know each other a little more. If you still think I’m a threat that needs to be eliminated with great force at the end of the meal, I’ll go, and we won’t talk again.” “You won’t submit to my judgment?” Batman asks. “Allow yourself to be eliminated with great force?” “Would you?” Clark asks. * In which Clark tries to make a new friend, Bruce doesn't have a lot of experience with trust, and two chronically lonely men find themselves a little less alone.

entry.title: You can take the boy from the circus
entry.summary:
Author: Shelbyino

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,007Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 88

Summary: Damian Al-Ghul Wayne had everything at one point. He was a prince. Ibn al Xu'ffasch. Son of the bat. Heir to the demon.He had never asked to be ripped away from everything that he knew, from the warmth of his home, his culture, his palace in Nanda Parbat. He had never asked to be shipped to a gloomy, grey city.Even when his father kept taking in orphans and ruining his plans for inheritance, Damian stood steadfast.But then his father died, leaving behind his newest orphan.A tiny acrobat with watery blue eyes and black curls, who spoke no English. Damian knew the boy never asked to be ripped away from everything that he knew, from the warmth of his home, his culture, his circus troupe.Damian knew he needed to be there for him.

entry.title: Red Sun
entry.summary:
Author: DiseasedBreeze

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,204Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 389

Summary: The war between Earth and the battle fleet of Krypton has been going on long enough it’s hard to remember what Earth was like pre-alien invasion. Slade doesn’t mind that, as one of the metahuman supersoldiers keeping Earth from being totally crushed he gets to enjoy a few little privileges, like having a Kryptonian prisoner for his personal use. He’s tortured enough aliens over the course of the war to understand how to handle them. Red solar lights, a kryptonite collar and magic chains will keep his new toy secured. He’s not expected to get much intel out of a low-ranked foot soldier, spared by accident rather than designed. He’s a gift for Slade to work out the alien’s weaknesses. There’s one in particular he’s looking forward to exploring; Kryptonians are programmed to obey officers. As a human he looks close enough to qualify.

entry.title: Jealousy Spilt
entry.summary:
Author: ShipsandSmuts

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,954Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 26

Summary: “I'm bored of the booze,” Bruce groaned, “I want to taste something else,” and if it weren’t for the fact that his hands were now creeping up Clark's front, he may have let out a little laugh. Bruce, whining? No, scratch that – Batman whining? Shit, he had always wanted to catch a glimpse of the spoiled rich kid persona one day, but this is not what he had in mind. “Wh-What do you mean?” The Bruce that Clark was most familiar with was the one that donned the cowl, who had no patience to crack anything more than a smirk before getting back to business. “Don't play dumb, Clark.” The Bruce before him was seemingly just as impatient and just as smug. “You don’t have to play the bumbling reporter with me, you know.” And yet a completely different person at the same time. “No masks necessary.” Clark wouldn't have minded some sort of facade, though – a filter at least. “I'm not like Miss Lane.” Too late. OR At a charity event, Clark Kent gets pulled aside by a seemingly drunken and very clearly jealous Bruce Wayne. That is all :)

entry.title: and when i'm gone, just carry on, don't mourn, rejoice
entry.summary:
Author: dwarflover4life

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,020Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 14

Summary: He wanted to end it – had thought about doing it since his parents had passed when he was just an eight-year-old boy – but he couldn’t. When he felt this way he often thought of his oldest son, Dick, and his butler Alfred.And Clark.And that’s why he’s decided to draft up a new will and a contingency plan of sorts. He already had many in place, but this would be the final one – he needed to make it count. So that when he ended it all, everything would go smoothly, and they could all forget about Bruce and finally be happy.It was the perfect solution.Everything could be fixed with a plan.At the start of January in the new year he would be a dead man. (title inspired by 'When I'm Gone' by Eminem)

entry.title: Bonded by Blood
entry.summary:
Author: 3v3rl0ve

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,376Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 162

Summary: What if 'Clark Kent' as we know him, was born and raised on Krypton. What if the planet was destroyed on his 19th birthday, and this time, instead of Kal-el and Kara Zor-el being the only Kryptonians to survive, a much larger group of them do. Earth must learn to co-habitate with these new 'aliens' in their solar system. The Kryptonians must learn to control and not monopolise their extreme strength. What better way to do this then to arrange a marriage between the youngest surviving member of the Kryptonians, and the easily-controlled Gothamite billionaire play-boy.

entry.title: Kiss me to Silence me
entry.summary:
Author: Carebearperson

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,873Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 201

Summary: Clark hummed tiredly, “… Take pictures of… him… for our… Wedding.. He’s so beautiful.” A heated blush flooded his cheeks before biting his tongue from exclaiming. His hand trembles while the rest of his body freezes. ‘Did he just say wedding?!’ “After… Take him to… Dinner.. His favorite place..” Clark’s arm tightened slightly around his waist, “Then… I’ll propose.” — Tomorrow is their six year anniversary. Clark and Bruce are practically tied to each other with their red string of faith. Bruce was fully prepared to take any surprise Clark could throw at him—what he didn’t expect was to be whispered the plans directly into his ear. Especially when Clark’s plan was to propose to him.

entry.title: The Company We Keep
entry.summary:
Author: WrenA

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,670Chapters: 9/11Kudos: 104

Summary: They say you can tell a person by the company they keep and all Barry could say about Superman was that he was far from the goodie-two-shoes everyone made him out to be initially. If you were to go by said company:- The colleagues at the Daily Planet and especially Lois and Jimmy- Clark's parents who always send sweets- Clark's close friend, Thomas, who sports a permanent stubble, disheveled hair and dark circles under the eyes- The mysterious 'B' who Superman sometimes calls to call in a favor when something requires a more tricky investigation- Nightwing, who is part of the league but acts incredibly familiar to Supes- An assortment of friends that he keeps mentioning- A (possible) crime lord whose file keeps getting deleted from the Watchtower databases- An array of vigilantes that absolutely refuse to join the league and have an unhealthy obsession for bats- THE BATMAN!? THE BATMAN IS REAL and does Superman know BATMAN!?- Lex Luthor, a homicidal billionaire- Bruce Wayne, not a homicidal billionaire, just annoying- Superman's kids?!? Or glimpses into the life of Superman over time, as seen through the eyes of one Barry Allen.

entry.title: Sanatorium
entry.summary:
Author: riversiders

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,198Chapters: 1/20Kudos: 21

Summary: They're forcing Bruce to rest. Tucked away on the Kents' farm in rural Kansas with Superman as his keeper, he has little choice but to cooperate. At least Dick is happy—happier. It's good for him to be around normal, well-adjusted people. They can be there for him in ways Bruce is incapable of. The more he reads of his mother's journal, the more certain he becomes; Bruce Wayne was never destined to be part of a happy family. Meanwhile, back in Gotham, the Batclub's hard at work. It'll be a dirty job, bringing Thomas Elliot to justice. Luckily, Lois, Harvey, and Selina are perfectly comfortable with the morally grey.
